Package com.alexisdrai.popsim

Class RabbitModel

java.lang.Object
com.alexisdrai.popsim.RabbitModel
public final class RabbitModel
extends java.lang.Object

has fields and methods meant to model a Rabbit population roughly, including growing and shrinking

      boolean arePredatorsActive()

    • setPredatorsActive

      private void setPredatorsActive​(boolean arePredatorsActive)

    • makeRabbit

      private Rabbit makeRabbit()

      simply calls makeRabbit(boolean) with a random boolean based on FEMALE_RATIO

      Returns:
      a Rabbit instance with randomized sex

    • makeRabbit

      private Rabbit makeRabbit​(boolean isFemale)

      increments the number of births for this model and instantiates a new Rabbit of a predetermined sex.

      if that was a predator rabbit (don't question it), it increments the number of predators as well.

      note that FemaleRabbit are a subclass of Rabbit

      Parameters:
      isFemale - said predetermined sex: true for FemaleRabbit, false for Rabbit
      Returns:
      a Rabbit instance of the determined sex

    • destroyRabbit

      private void destroyRabbit​(Rabbit rabbit)

      increments the number of deaths for this model and invokes a given Rabbit's Rabbit.kill() method

      if that was a predator rabbit (don't question it), decrements the number of predators as well

      Parameters:
      rabbit - the Rabbit instance to be destroyed

    • getPop

      private int getPop()

      calculates the current population total for this model

      Returns:
      the current population total

    • cull

      private void cull()

      decreases the population total by a number through the use of "predators"

    • run

      int run()

      runs the RabbitModel through a statically given number of steps (months)

      Returns:
      the final population total
